explains: v. 渐渐变大；变为；给……上蜡（wax 的过去分词）

sentences.en: He waxed lyrical on the food at the new restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他对这家新餐馆的菜肴越说越来劲。

sentences.en: She has just had her legs waxed at the local beauty parlour.
sentences.cn: 她刚在当地的美容院用蜡去了腿毛。

sentences.en: Lovett was a tall, commanding man with a waxed grey moustache.
sentences.cn: 洛维特是一位留着灰白短髭、高个子的威严男人。
